name: Adult Foster Care of the North Shore, Inc.
specialty: Custodial Care Facility, Adult Care Home

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Adult Foster Care of the North Shore, Inc. is a Custodial Care Facility, Adult Care Home provider based in Gloucester, MA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $60.6M in Medicaid payments across 595K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $60.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
